website_summaries.verdict: A no-frills tower fan that puts out decent airflow but is lacking when it comes to useful features.
pros: Powerful air output with oscillating movement works well for most rooms
Fairly thin design with straightforward controls
cons: Construction feels less durable than competitors

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tatty product look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Very very shoddily made, seems to work quite well but it looks like it's been put together in the dark by a 4 year old. The plastic wrap that protects the product was put on before assembly so pieces are stuck between the joins and it has been forced to fit at the top with the inner lip sitting on top of the outer.
customer_reviews.author: Kurisutoofa

customer_reviews.title: A really good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fast and on-time delivery. Great fan at an incredibly low price. Quiet and powerful cooling system. Highly recommended to others who want to buy a tower fan on budget. Thanks Vytronix for this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: yl

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Delivered poorly. Broken item, rattles when turned on and immediately filled room with smell of smoke. Poorly put together, plastic cover put on before assembled so lots of plastic is stuck inside. Bulging at the joints and very unstable. Not good with kids around. Really disappointed and now lots of unnecessary extra work for us with returning it. Waiting to hear from company regarding return and refund. Very disappointed and angry. Update: return accepted but cost of return is mine until refund!!! This item will be expensive to return and I've just got to hope that the refund includes postage. Really bad purchase. Not recommended to anyone
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: A decent fan to keep you cool
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put this together. The airflow is decent (I just wish the lowest setting would be a lot lower) and the highest setting really throws a lot of air out. My only gripe is that it tends to rattle when the oscillate is on. Everything has been screwed in firmly so I'm not sure why it rattles.
customer_reviews.author: Martin T.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan! :)
customer_reviews.text: Really good fan, ordered one for ours and my sons bedrooms with it being hotter weather atm and they work great especially for the price, 3 different settings too which are nice and powerful! Would definitely recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie Coley

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thank came be for it said it would works very well to keep you cool thank you
customer_reviews.author: Felt making

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived one day earlier than expected. Looks like how it is on the pictures and is easy to assemble (just screw it to the base). Helps me get to sleep during warm days. It does produce a minimal sound but I wouldnt consider it noisy. I would recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Best fan we have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant fan. Quiet and powerful enough. Fantastic value for money we are ordering another
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Tower fan
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with fan, certainly does the job. Probably not as “high end” quality that you may get from the more expensive ones, but we bought it mainly to keep our old dog cool, and she loves it blowing over her, and it’s quiet enough that you can still hear the tv - perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good price for what it does
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a mistake but given the recent hot weather I decided to keep it. As some other reviewers have said, it's not amazingly built and the protective shrink wrap has been put on prior to assembly which isn't great. It is easy to put together just a few screws to put through base plate. It works OK and rotates though 3 settings or non rotating, it is a tad noisy even on the lowest setting. Easy to use no timer etc but for £24.99 I can't complain also it comes with a year's warranty that you have to register so that's useful to have.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K J L Sturmey

customer_reviews.title: excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: i bought this going by a few reviews,,and for the price i was a bit dubious,but its amazing,i have shared the link to my facebook page,cant believe how good it is compared to the higher priced items that looked very simular,,i highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Fiona M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, people need to stop moaning
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the package. Had no issues, and it circulates the air a treat. No more noiser then a normal desk fan, so don't understand the negative reviews about noise. It has blades so it will make noise, get over it or buy a blade less one, and stop complaining. And as far as the "plastic bits are still there when I removed the protective plastic" like I said before, you get what you paid for, yeah it's annoying, but at that price, just what are you complaining about? Good value for money, would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pallett

customer_reviews.title: It is great for a low price and does exactly what I want it to do, keep me cool
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit nervous about buying this because of some of the reviews but I took a chance and brought it anyway and I'm glad it did. It turned up before the delivery date it said. It is a little noisy but no where near as noisy as my normal blade turn fan. It is easy to assemble and it keeps me nice and cool. Looks great and good value for money. I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Overall i am happy with this product and think its great value, however, i was shocked when i came home from work yesterday to see it had been left on my doorstep while i was at work! I appreciate this is not the sellers fault but anyone could have taken the item. Also when i opened it, it has a few marks and paint on the cable which is very odd as it was all wrapped up, however, it does look second hand because of this. I am happy with the product as it is fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.author: MISS SMC JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is so good that I have purchased a fourth! Chucks cold air constantly, powerful enough to have blown a candle out ten feet away, on the lowest setting!
customer_reviews.author: Gillie

customer_reviews.title: Read on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan when it was half price, I paid £25 when it arrived it was badly scratched and very noisy it sounded like cracking noises wether I was on stand still or to rotate. Contacted seller initially very apologetic and offered to send out a new one, which they didn’t do. I suppose I didn’t mind paying for a damaged and scratched fan as it was half price at the time but I would not pay full price for this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Runaway_xo

customer_reviews.title: Performs well, good value for money but had a manufacturing defect that I had to fix
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with its performance overall, it does the job it needs to do at a decent price, but it arrived with plastic trapped inside which was making a noise as it brushed against the fan blades and could have been dangerous (e.g. if it melted against the motor and caught fire) so I had to open it up and remove it, then it was much quieter and safe.
customer_reviews.author: MarcusJT

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This fan is very good value for the price. I was slightly put off with some of the negative reviews but decided to cut my losses and make an order. Very glad I did because this fan is just what I wanted. Yes it does make a slight noise but no more than any other fan I’ve ever had and I can still hear my tv over it without having to turn the volume up.
customer_reviews.author: victoria watts

customer_reviews.title: What a load of rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: On opening the box it seemed ok but put it on the table to assemble the base a lot of rattling was apparent and a screw and bits of wire and plastic fell out of the vents still rattling i peered inside with a torch only to find a large plastic cogwheel lying inside which looked like a cog from a drive shaft.I really think this item could have been dangerous if switched on please avoid.
customer_reviews.author: pancho

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan it really works at keeping me cool, it’s quieter then any other fan I’ve had but to be honest unless your willing to pay 4-5 hundred pounds your never get a silent fan, so I’m very happy I bought this. But hard to get base on but I managed and I have bad arthritis in my fingers. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: bluelight

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly disappointed with the strength of this fan as it seems to make a small difference in very hot weather. However, it is good value for money, looks really nice and definitely does the job on a day to day basis when the temperature is not too high.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan
customer_reviews.text: My parents put it together but there is some random bits of plastic hanging out the cracks but just pull them off and its not a problem. It is quite a strong fan that im surprised at the power of it as it was cheap. It does rotate but could do with being a little quieter. Overall good product and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the summer!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this fan !! Easy to assemble, it rotates and has three settings. Doesn’t have a sleep mode but I leave it on setting one all night. It’s not loud so doesn’t keep you awake (unlike my old fan) the kids are pestering for one each for their rooms now! Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: danie

customer_reviews.title: fan
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but after few days it stops turning. The customer service was amazing and helpful. 4 stars for the fan and 5 for customer service. The fan is ok for the price, around 25
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chucks out warm air after a while due to motor overheating
customer_reviews.text: Average at best, BIGGEST problem is that if you’ve had it on for a couple of hours then the motor heats up and the fan starts chucking out warm air and Second is its poorly put together with the wrapping stuck between the pieces and hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Jae d.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, great buy
customer_reviews.text: Read a couple of negative reviews but still went ahead and ordered. Very easy to set up. Can hardly hear any noise. Originally bought for our room, but kids use for TV room now. Great buy and very modern looking. Slim item and can be stored in corner and doesn’t take up much space. Great buy 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Magowan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Fan worked fine for three months and then the motor got burned and the fan doesn’t work at all. Tried changing fuse but it’s the motor which got burned out. Not satisfied with the fan as it worked for only 3 months whereas other fans I bought are still working after few years
customer_reviews.author: Balaji

customer_reviews.title: Noisier than I expected, and not as cold
customer_reviews.text: With tomorrow’s highs of 32°C, I’m hoping the fan works better than what it is working at the moment? The fan was good for its price, however it isn’t very quiet. I’ve certainly heard louder fans, but I have to wear earplugs to use the fan in bed, but then instead of being too hot, I then too uncomfortable. I’m also unsure as to if the fan to best used with open, or closed windows, or those which are on vent???
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Blunn

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: Got delivered very quickly. Easy put together. Tried and tested last night. Very quiet, I slept without being disturbed. Only used setting 1 as it provided enough cold air for our bedroom. Marvelous Fan, would definitely recommend 👌
customer_reviews.author: Jas Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic fan
customer_reviews.text: There is no sleep mode or remote control. I brought for my childrens bedrooms. Does it's purpose, and helps them get to sleep when its too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Gems

customer_reviews.title: Flame thrower.
customer_reviews.text: Potentially dangerous item. The fan exploded and filled the room with black smoke and the smell of burnt plastic. This was after just a couple of hours light use. The refund process went smoothly and communication from the seller was first class. The item however is cheap and flimsy. I can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Best

customer_reviews.title: The fan that does what it says on the tin! Cools
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking fab that does the job with 3 speed settings and an extra 3 that swivel back and forth. Great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hunter😁

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this fan was 1/2 price! Took a punt despite some poor reviews and was not disappointed at all. Quiet, very easy to set up does exactly what it’s meant to, cools you down quietly. The other bonus was that it arrived 6 days earlier than stated! Beezer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easier to cool down a room with rotating feature, fairly quiet for a fan! would recommend this to anyone looking to buy a freestanding fan. The cord length is a good length which means its easy to place where needed.
customer_reviews.author: S Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product will 100% and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia coates

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Is ok only problem the screws were missing so had to purchase some. They did say then send some but will take to long as I needed the fan for those hot days
customer_reviews.author: luis1

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Really good fan looks smart and works well bargain at this price very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: markus

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me cool but have to play soft music at night to avoid listening to the sound of the fan. Gets annoying as not silent
customer_reviews.author: Jethwa

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made with flimsy plastic, works fine but it is quite loud, looks cheap and the plastic wrap that protects the product was put on before assembly so pieces are stuck between the seams and it has been forced to fit at the top with the inner lip sitting on top of the outer
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: FANtastic!
customer_reviews.text: Neat and sturdy , mostly used at night during very warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: PAULINE BURTON

customer_reviews.title: A life saver during the heatwave!
customer_reviews.text: This fan has been an absolute life saver during a summer heat wave. It's nice and quiet even on the strongest setting so I've had it on all night, very close to my bed which allowed me to sleep more comfortably. Without it, there is no chance I would have been able to sleep in this heat. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Product is very flimsy and tacky Base plastic is very light also flimsy Very unstable and would fall over with soft touch I will want To return the product for refund
customer_reviews.author: Fahorin nahar

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: The fan it’s self works well however the stand for this fan is terrible - it’s looks cheap and is not manufactured well. You have to fiddle with it for a while before it even sits right and rotates. Should I have know this I would have not made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Naria

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. NOT ultra quiet.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it’s a great item. Not very well put manufactured I had to clip the main body together when it arrived. No biggie though. It all works fine. My only gripe is that the description says it’s ultra quiet - it isn’t. Can’t complain for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: George Boyle

customer_reviews.title: tall enough and gets all around the room
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Highly reccommend and got half price which makes it better to. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: amanda magill

customer_reviews.title: It is quiet, sturdy and keeps the room cool.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. She absolutely adores it. Packaged well, delivered on time, good speed levels, does the job perfectly and very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fan, not quiet
customer_reviews.text: It doea the job but makes a proper racket. Also looks like it cost about a few pounds to make.
customer_reviews.author: style83

customer_reviews.title: Speedy delivery good value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 1 day earlier than expected great just in time for the hottest day of the year! Enjoying the breeze although could be more powerful, does the job intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: No good No cool air Quiet And have to return at your own cost
customer_reviews.author: Jay P

customer_reviews.title: This quiet fan is very good value
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this tower fan, arrived early, and does exactly what it says quietly
customer_reviews.author: mrs marie morton

customer_reviews.title: Basic fan
customer_reviews.text: Ok fan. Doesn’t seem to cool air at all. Quite noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Nice discreet fan. Very quiet. Fits easily into a corner. Very good quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Watson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Amazing very powerful best thing I've baught in a long time
customer_reviews.author: ellentoby2010

customer_reviews.title: Cool just when I needed it to be
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product easy for my husband to set up and arrived just when I needed it the most, can’t imagine life without it A*
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOWER FAN
customer_reviews.text: Great tower fan for the price, easy to put together, screws were missing when delivered but messaged seller and they were sent the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, cheap base.
customer_reviews.text: The fan itself is great, but the base is extremely cheap. The base of the fan is made of two cheap plastic parts and won't connect to each other properly. I would recommend buying a different fan.
customer_reviews.author: David Rattigan

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price. Not great
customer_reviews.text: Does the job pretty well. But the base is too weak. Doesn't stay intact. Okay for the price. The quality is compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Mohreet

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and light good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she is over the moon with it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Betley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is really poor - unstable plastic tower. When I asked to return this back I got a follow-up question from the seller seeking specific reasons and instruction to pay myself postage costs.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery just in time before it gets to hot. Have brought fans from this seller before and never had any problems fantastic service and seller
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Worked effectively  for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The fan arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. It worked effectively as described. A great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: andrea pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great value fan
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for my children’s bedrooms and I am really impressed. They are decent fans, not really noisy or clunky. They look good too. For a budget option I would 100% recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great, quiet and powerful, but don't touch it or it'll topple over lol
customer_reviews.author: JJ Mullis

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, great fan for such a cheap price. I am very impressed with this fan and I fully recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the pennies
customer_reviews.text: Cancelled an AO order at close to treble the price to get two of these. Work as expected and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Decent fan
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super quickly, easy to assemble and stable - it does a perfectly decent job for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordinary Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality, Don't look too good. Cheap plastic. Could be letter even the price we paid for this. We can get better quality form high street own brand.
customer_reviews.author: CatEyes

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I like the fans very much. They generate alot of cool area. The only downside is that there is no timer function nor remote control.
customer_reviews.author: p wright/m gershon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I used this product only a handful of time and when I tried to put it on today the first two setting of the fan no longer works I am beyond angry.
customer_reviews.author: skye

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely fan. It is quiet then the other two I have. Value for money. If has timer than even better.
customer_reviews.author: Fat woman

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, cheaply build
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing product. Very noisy compared to our other fans. Build quality feels alarmingly cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Ran

customer_reviews.title: Does as says on box
customer_reviews.text: Good at circulating the air. Does as says on box. Quite noisy when on number 3 and oscillating.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ball

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan with 3 speeds.
customer_reviews.text: Love this oscillating fan it's fantastic and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Not very quite
customer_reviews.text: Stylish & lightweight. Great price, but rather loud. Not ideal for the bedroom while trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Evans

customer_reviews.title: dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Fan burnt out after a few uses ...could smell electrical burning
customer_reviews.author: Liam W.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Nicely priced tower fan, quieter than expected and good cooling and range on the fans.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing ever bought on amazon very cheap quality speed changing thing not working very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Chaudhary

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, looks good and good fan
customer_reviews.text: Good value and great power for the price. Also very quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and makes a big difference in a very hot office
customer_reviews.author: Miss E M Quayle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Not as quiet what i expected,but does the job perfectly. Perfect value for this money. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sof

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price, just what I wanted. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this fan and pretty quiet too! Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: B L

customer_reviews.title: Great product Tower fan
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for this price and works well yes I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: FAISAL H.

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: w.r.t quality cost is a bit high, costed me £22+
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: .good value ..plus the fact it was in the sale
customer_reviews.text: I like the fan ,it was reduced in price .good value for money .
customer_reviews.author: Alice H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 day and just a couple of hours in that day!
customer_reviews.text: My fan arrived early which was fantastic. It was easy to assemble and was running in minutes. Not massively powerful but nice and quiet. Turned it on the following day and it has stopped oscillating, fan is working fine its just it doesn't move anymore and is stuck in one position. Which is a bit pointless when you buy an oscillating fan. BUYER BEWARE that you will be expected to pay for the items return if it develops a fault. Apparently they will give me that back if it meets their definition of faulty. I see fun times ahead, they also helpfully suggest to send it via a tracking method - proof of postage will be enough .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super/Good price/Cooling/Quick postage/Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Purchased before impending heat wave, we call it the beast! Yes it’s a lil noisy but it’s quite a big tower twisting round! I will take the noise over sweating profusely anyday, I literally have it on floor next to bed aimed at my head & wouldn’t be without it when we get our muggy weather. Quick delivery & have used it a few months before adding this review so I am quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Good performance and price
customer_reviews.text: Came 3 days early...Easy to assemble, stable, not silent but unobtrusive enough, easy to use, smart looking enough,doesnt use as much as most light bulbs to run.. the shrink wrap was a pita to get off as it assembled with it on,but no problem really.. its a 25 quid fan, so dont expect a dyson air blaster ,it performs fine and is a good price
customer_reviews.author: digger06

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The fact its 33oc and the fan has arrived and is in a really bad state,worst thing ever purchased,i had to star rate and i did not want to
customer_reviews.author: lee cutter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value for money and has 3 settings on either static or rotation. Slimline and discreet, it looks fab. I’ve used it in my bedroom mostly and wonder how I managed without it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mc

customer_reviews.title: pay up for better quality
customer_reviews.text: Seriously basic quality. Fan arrived with scratches to is body. Not too noisy and required some assembly. Fussy and would have rather paid up in hindsight for better quality
customer_reviews.author: tadams

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular.... an absolute brilliant buy, you could dry your hair with them, and so easy to assemble and to use, the fact that I found out they spin from left to right, so happy, thank you 😊 I
customer_reviews.author: Mandie49

customer_reviews.title: Good half price offer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at a half price offer-which I was happy to pay as it's all it is worth.The product is very light(cheap construction). It's not as powerful as I was expecting but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: janet hampson

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Absoloutely shocking quality would not even give this a 1 star. Turned up wired exposed and not working and customer services offering a new crap fan or a refund but I have 2 take it to the local dpd drop off point which is 3 miles away . Inconveinent for me and a really shockingly crap product. Avoid avoid avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: it is not secure
customer_reviews.text: Not wonderful thought it would be better than this, a bit cheap looking and does not stay on the stand and awful to put together
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early so was very happy because the weather is getting hot. And its so easy to handle as its light. And its not tok loud so you can hear the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, not too noisy and seems powerful even on low setting. Simple design and slimline means it fits in well!
customer_reviews.author: Lewis’Mummy

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I like it, simple easy to set up and has all the functions I need for my home gym. Fan rotates and is fairly quiet Sleek design Absolute bargain
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, will have few small but fixable issues, but okay tower fan
customer_reviews.text: Okay fan, had a few small issues out of box, as mentioned by other reviewers. Sticky tape and cling film stuck inside the edges.
customer_reviews.author: BreezingThrough

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good fan, easy to set up, works well, rotates around the room well and keeps us cool enough.
customer_reviews.author: BN
